desc: Zedric's is San Antonio's premier provider of delicious, healthy, chef-prepared meals for busy people!

layout.text:
Combining flavor and nutrition, we’ve created a majestic array of healthy, chef-prepared meals that are ready-to-eat and fit for any lifestyle.
Our meals are available 7 days a week. We also offer online ordering for pickup or delivery, as well as a subscription service for the ultimate in time and cost savings.
